name: Grocery Stores

metadata.exclusions: No known exclusions beyond documented table/model constraints.
metadata.confidence_notes: Validated against seeded demo dataset; verify against production policies before external reporting.

business_purpose: Master list of store locations used for sales, inventory, and procurement analysis.

key_columns.name: store_id
key_columns.business_meaning: Unique identifier for each grocery store

key_columns.name: store_code
key_columns.business_meaning: Human-friendly store code used in operations

key_columns.name: region
key_columns.business_meaning: Geographic region used for regional rollups

common_queries: SELECT region, COUNT(*) FROM grocery_stores GROUP BY region
SELECT store_name FROM grocery_stores ORDER BY store_name
gotchas: Use store_id for joins; store_name can change over time
